title: Junior Programmer
description: In addition to placement year responsibilities:
responsibilities: Effective client communication, listening to requirements and providing adaptive support.
Task delegation and management through Azure DevOps to plan and ensure successful task completion.
Designing and planning out new features and taking a lead in their implementation.

title: Placement Programmer
responsibilities: Full stack development in Angular and C#, utilising TypeScript, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, ensuring high-quality code and functionality.
Used GIT version control, ensuring proper branching, merging, and conflict resolution in a hybrid setting.

title: Programmer
responsibilities: Installed and setup web software for clients via FTP, gaining practice in client communication.
Created C# solutions within the Unity3D Game Engine, aiding my ability to think algorithmically and solve problems.
Built Java modifications for the popular game Minecraft, gaining over 200,000 unique views across the English and Chinese speaking world.
